TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmFunctionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmFunctionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EdmFunctionAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: An attribute that, when applied to a method, indicates that the method is a proxy for a function in the conceptual model or storage model.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmFunctionAttribute> links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function. For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model. Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries.
To use an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmFunctionAttribute> to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true:
- The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function.
- The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function.
For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).

Docs.related: How to: Call Custom Database Functions
How to: Call Functions Defined in the Conceptual Model

Public Sub New (namespaceName As String, functionName As String)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The namespace of the mapped-to function.
The name of the mapped-to function.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
